name: Escape Artist: The Trial
description: Escape Artist: The Trial enables you to find your inner escape artist! Combining the best parts of a real life room escape experience into Virtual Reality, Escape Artist: The Trial goes even further: break things to make things!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8.1 or later, Windows® 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290, equivalent or better Additional Notes: Video output: 1x HDMI 1.4 port, or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer + USB: 1x USB 2.0 port or newer
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better Additional Notes: Video output: 1x HDMI 1.4 port, or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer + USB: 1x USB 2.0 port or newer
